name: Savvy: Insights Explorer - order information, come up with ideas
abstract: An easy way to turn information into bright insights
text: An AI powered knowledge base with auto categorization and recommender system that helps creative researchers to keep all information under control and get insights based on their interests.
description: An AI powered knowledge base with auto categorization and recommender system to keep all information under control and get insights based on your interests.
keywords: ai, auto, categorization, control, creative, idea, information, insight, interest, keep, knowledge base, note, note-taking, order, organize, recommender system, researchers, savvy, tags

review.author: Lucas
review.reviewBody: Good luck, sounds like a really cool plan!

review.author: Oliver
review.reviewBody: Very good! I would use the app.

review.author: Anita
review.reviewBody: I think it could be very successful! I would buy such an app. Well done!
